teams.name: Mars Hill Lending Team
teams.description:
From 2007 to 2012, the Mars Hill community invested $1.2 million dollars to support the efforts of Turame Community Finance in Burundi, Africa. Now we are continuing our involvement with Turame in an even more hands-on-way - by becoming microfinance lenders. 

How to get involved:
1. Click the join team button to the left [if you are new to Kiva you will need to create an account].

2. Choose a Borrower: Check out the current Turame loans by scrolling down at this link: [http://bit.ly/pGU0sd] If there are no new loans, check back in as Turame posts new loans twice a month.

3. Make a Loan:

4. Get Repaid: Over the course of 6 months your loan will get repaid to you in the form of Kiva credit. [This is a loan, not a donation]

5. Repeat.  You can take the money and put it back in your pocket or make a loan to another group.

Thanks for helping support Turame Community Finance in providing loans to those living in one of the poorest countries on the planet. 
You can learn more about Turame here: www.kiva.org/partners/162

teams.name: T4G
teams.loan_because: We believe we can help change the world.
teams.description:
T4G is built on a solid foundation employing great people who are creative, dedicated and passionate about what they do.

Over the next five years we will be investing in the things that matter to us. These topics include:

Organization - What will the organization of the future look like?
Sustainability - How can we do more with less?
Technology - How quickly can the rules of the game change?
Innovation - Can we do it better, faster and with more impact?
Social Responsibility - How can we accomplish more good?

teams.name: Jewish Lending Group
teams.loan_because:
"The greatest level, is to support a fellow by endowing him with a gift or loan, or entering into a partnership with him, or finding employment for him, in order to strengthen his hand until he need no longer be dependent upon others." - Maimonides' Eight Levels of Charity 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                                 
"If we donate only to Jewish causes or to individual Jews in need, we may stop seeing everyone as being equally created in God's image and therefore worthy of our help. After all, we are all members of one race, the human race." -- Rabbi Joseph Telushkin
teams.description: Jews and non-Jews from around the world who want to help improve the world, one step at a time.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.description: The Episcopal Church is part of the worldwide Anglican Communion, and traces its heritage to the beginnings of Christianity.  We celebrate our unity in Christ while honoring our differences, always putting the work of love before uniformity of opinion. We believe in amendment of life, the forgiveness of sin, and life everlasting.  All are welcome to find a spiritual home in the Episcopal Church.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.loan_because: Kiva is well-aligned with what we see as EY's broader corporate responsibility, which is to put our people’s workplace skills toward making a difference in our communities around the world.  We recognize the power of entrepreneurship for job creation and poverty alleviation.
teams.description: EY is one of the largest professional services firms in the world.

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.

teams.name: Skizziks
teams.description: A group of lifelong friends interested in doing some good.

teams.name: Student Loans
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world, and we think this is an amazing, renewable way to do so.

teams.name: University of Queensland (UQ)
teams.loan_because:
No matter how much you suffer, suffering is always subjective. There are people in the world far worse off than you.

"If we value the life of a child more than going to fancy restaurants, the next time we dine out we will know that we could have done something better with our money. If that makes living a morally decent life extremely arduous, well, then that is the way things are. If we don't do it, then we should at least know that we are failing to live a morally decent life — not because it is good to wallow in guilt but because knowing where we should be going is the first step toward heading in that direction." 

Peter Singer
teams.description: A group of concerned students.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Scona Loaners
teams.loan_because: We want to help others write a better story for their lives.  We want to leave a powerful legacy that will make a difference in the world.
teams.description:
Strathcona high school's motto is "As one who serves".  Microloans is our school's choice for a global initiative this year.

Head to http://twitter.com/#!/sconaloaners
http://strathconaschool.ca/
Our e-mail address is sconaloaners@gmail.com

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Team Japan
teams.loan_because: we feel that we can help the world, one person at a time.
teams.description:
There are many Kiva lenders who live in Japan, and we hope to be able to make a difference, not only as individuals, but now as a team. Please feel free to join us....not only from anywhere in Japan, but anywhere in the world. All you need is an interest in Japan. 

一緒に貧困をなくしましょう．．．お待ちしています！

(Picture: Mt. Fuji and the full moon at sunrise New Year's Day 2010 写真：朝日の富士山と満月２０１０年元日）

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: Remembering Europe
teams.loan_because: It is important to remember where we came from and also to pay homage to the beautiful culture and heritage that has come out of and can still be found in Europe. Also, it seems Europe is often overlooked as an area of the world that still requires some assistance and when people think about what they can do for charity in developing nations it may not be the first place that comes to mind. So this team is for people who feel it is important to remember their heritage and others who come from this beautiful and culturally rich land.
teams.description: Funeral Garden is a company that was founded in 2004 by Tala de Sade with the mandate of giving back to the community by helping independent artists and writers around the world sell their wares and earn a living by following their passion with hard work and dedication. This charity was set up as an extension of that mandate and is being promoted through our company as a way to give back by loaning money to others who also seek to better their lives through the same dedicated work ethic.

teams.name: Kiva Mormons
teams.loan_because: "A man filled with the love of God is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race." ~ Joseph Smith
teams.description: Members and friends of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints who are also Kiva lenders.

teams.name: T4G
teams.loan_because: We believe we can help change the world.
teams.description:
T4G is built on a solid foundation employing great people who are creative, dedicated and passionate about what they do.

Over the next five years we will be investing in the things that matter to us. These topics include:

Organization - What will the organization of the future look like?
Sustainability - How can we do more with less?
Technology - How quickly can the rules of the game change?
Innovation - Can we do it better, faster and with more impact?
Social Responsibility - How can we accomplish more good?

teams.name: Suppendaneum
teams.loan_because: We care
teams.description: Our mission is to glorify God while planning weird trips to the farthest corners of the world and eating the finest food available

teams.name: Tuck's Be the Change
teams.loan_because: We were given these gift cards from our sister/daughter for Christmas....and it sounded like a great idea!

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Eagle County, CO Government
teams.loan_because: Various reasons
teams.description: Staff of local government.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***NEW: TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

teams.name: Celebrate Lynn Asa Huggett
teams.loan_because: Asa loved to help, give, and heal others.  This will allow her spirit to continue to give, particularly in Peru, a country she loved.
teams.description: When I climbed this mountain, I knew I was doing it for more than just me; I knew I was climbing it on behalf of my community, a community of women—for you. - Asa Huggett

teams.name: Cove Kiva
teams.loan_because: “If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him?  Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth.”  (1 John 3:17-18 NIV)
teams.description: Jesus-followers who want to serve as He served

teams.name: MediaMiser
teams.loan_because: We believe in entrepreneurs
teams.description: A company that cares about others

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Williams College
teams.description: Students, faculty, staff and alumni of Williams College, in Williamstown MA.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?
